name: Oil Eco Factory Tycoon
description:
Your uncle has given you a small company he just bought. He built a small pumping business that he doesn't have time to grow. Now this compagny is yours. Improve this business but your uncle left you a key word... Ecology. Take care not to (too) pollute the surrounding air. For this, you have the choice between different buildings and tools. 

This game is a simple city builder. The player will have to build an ecological oil company or not ... but watch out for pollution. Obviously the primary goal is to make it ecological and to reach 1 million credits. 

For this the player can produce different resources like oil and then refine it. He will have to pay attention to the necessary energy and will have to manage these stocks.

Good luck ;)

❕ NOTE: For the moment, the game backup is not implemented
